name: Industrial Throat
content:
Industrial Throat

A massive industrial complex where the air is thick with smoke and the sound of machinery never ceases. Primary Objectives are control nodes. Secondary markers are power conduits or maintenance access points. The ground trembles with the constant pulse of industry.


Terrain Features:

  • Control nodes
  • Power conduits
  • Maintenance access points
  • Industrial machinery

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with smoke and the acrid smell of industry. The constant hum of machinery fills the air, and the ground vibrates with the pulse of massive engines. Steam hisses from broken pipes, creating an eerie mist.
